flow.path

Interface PathContextFactory


  • public interface PathContextFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.content.Context setUpContext(Path path, android.content.Context parentContext)
      Set up any services defined by this screen, and make them accessible via the context.
      void tearDownContext(android.content.Context context)
      Tear down any services previously started by setUpContext(Path, Context).

    • Method Detail

      • setUpContext

        android.content.Context setUpContext(Path path,
                                   android.content.Context parentContext)
        Set up any services defined by this screen, and make them accessible via the context. Typically this means returning a new context that wraps the given one.

      • tearDownContext

        void tearDownContext(android.content.Context context)
        Tear down any services previously started by setUpContext(Path, Context). Note that the Context instance given here may be a wrapper around an instance that this factory created.
